data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Samastipur do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Samastipur, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Samastipur, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 46,878 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Samastipur.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 46,878 believers in Samastipur that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Beldar Lonari (Hindu traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, it’s possible most of the 4,163,015 lost people in  Samastipur, Bihar, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 46,878 believers in Samastipur, Bihar, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Samastipur, Bihar, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

location.name: Samastipur
location.people_groups_list: Bania Adrakhi, Pasi Turuk, Sonar Barhaiya, Yadav Gaoli, Pasi (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bania Adrakhi (2,100), Pasi Turuk (1,300), Sonar Barhaiya (35,000), Yadav Gaoli (4,942,000), Pasi (Muslim traditions) (16,000)
